product_name: REI Merino Wool Hiking Socks - Women's
long_description: Hit the trail with a spring in your step! These REI cushioned hiking crew socks are designed specifically to fit the shape of a woman's foot. Supersoft merino wool provides enhanced moisture-wicking performance and itch-free comfort. Mesh knit ventilation panels over instep allow airflow and more moisture movement. Elastic arch bands hold socks in place and promote circulation; spandex knit throughout creates a memory fit. Soft padding underfoot cushions your steps; padded insteps relieve pressure from laces. Lin Toe(R) ''no feel'' seams mean no irritation or chafing at toes. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Hit the trail with a spring in your step! These REI cushioned hiking crew socks are designed specifically to fit the shape of a woman's foot.
